summary: Seasoned healthcare executive and consultant with over 40 years of clinical and nonclinical experience in EMS, emergency department operations, home health, and regulatory affairs. Proven leader in building and managing large teams, developing policies and procedures, and driving CQI/quality improvement. Board experience with leading EMS associations; extensive experience with accreditation, licensing, and workforce development.

experience.title: Travel Nurse (ED)
experience.description: Travel nurse assignments on ED contracts; Sarah Bush Lincoln Healthcare, Mattoon, IL; rural trauma and medical services.

experience.title: Travel Nurse (ED)
experience.description: ED contract at Mercy Merced Medical Center, Merced, CA; ED nurse for high acuity and census.

experience.title: Resource Nurse (ED)
experience.description: Resource nurse; support services to all hospital departments; performed difficult procedures including PICCs; ED responsibilities.

experience.title: Nursing Director
experience.description: Oversight of operations between two hospitals; EDs, ICUs, CCUs, NICUs, PICUs; psychiatric facility; staffing challenges and census management.

experience.title: ED Nurse / Supervisor / ED Registry
experience.description: Emergency Department nursing roles, supervision, and ED registry responsibilities.

experience.title: Director of EMS/Education/Human Resources and National Affairs
experience.description: Developed personnel, education, public relations, and employee health; established specialized Critical Care Transport and Nurse Teams; grew company from 150 to 1000 employees; authored policies; implemented infection control; CQI programs; OSHA compliance.

experience.title: EMS Director / Instructor
experience.description: Oversight of EMS system operations, ED and EMS education; Paramedic and EMT programs; continuing education; policy development.

experience.title: Firefighter/Paramedic/Diver
experience.company: Crete, Glenwood, and Cornbelt Fire Departments
experience.description: Intermittent roles in firefighting, paramedic duties, and diving activities.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Operations and systems development; OSHA and regulatory issues; startup EMS providers; HBV/TB vaccinations; staffing and patient care.

experience.title: Assistant Director of Nursing
experience.description: Provided Home Health to patients; infusion therapy; supervision of nursing staff; case management.

experience.title: Travel Nurse
experience.description: Travel nurse; supervised ancillary staff; home health to patients in the Oklahoma City region.

experience.title: Coordinator
experience.company: Illinois Department of Public Health (IDPH) Office of Preparedness and Response, Regional EMS
experience.description: Regulatory oversight for Trauma Centers, EMS and ED; site visits, investigations, licensing, inspections; disaster preparedness and response planning.
